00158     // Order of dimension elements: Time, Mass, Length, Angle
00159     // Value of dimension elements: exponent of that unit type
00160 
00167     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0> dimensionless;
00168 
00170     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,1,0,0,0,0,0,0,0> time;
00171 
00173     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,0,1,0,0,0,0,0,0> mass;
00174 
00176     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,0,0,1,0,0,0,0,0> length;
00177 
00179     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,0,0,0,1,0,0,0,0> angle;
00181

00186     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,0,0,2,0,0,0,0,0> area;
00187 
00189     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,0,0,3,0,0,0,0,0> volume;
00190 
00192     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,0,1,-3,0,0,0,0,0> density;
00193 
00195     typedef mpl::vector_c<int,-1,0,1,0,0,0,0,0> speed;
00196

00244     template <class Dimensions, class Precision = DefaultPrecision>
00245     struct Quantity
00246     {
00248         explicit Quantity(Precision x) : _value(x) {}
00249 
00251         Quantity() : _value() {}
00252 
00260         template <class OtherDimensions>
00261         Quantity(Quantity<OtherDimensions, Precision> const& rhs)
00262                 : _value(rhs.value()) {
00263             BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT((
00264                 mpl::equal<Dimensions,OtherDimensions>::type::value
00265             ));
00266         }
00267 
00269         Precision value() const { return _value; }
00270     private:
00271         Precision _value;
00272     };
00273 
00276 
00282     template<class D, class T>
00283     Quantity<D, T> operator+(const Quantity<D, T> & l, const Quantity<D, T> & r) {
00284         return Quantity<D,T>(l.value() + r.value());
00285     }
00286 
00292     template<class D, class T>
00293     Quantity<D, T> operator-(const Quantity<D, T> & l, const Quantity<D, T> & r) {
00294         return Quantity<D,T>(l.value() - r.value());
00295     }
00296 
00300 
00301     namespace Internal {
00302         using namespace mpl::placeholders;
00305 
00306         template <class D1, class D2>
00307         struct multiply_dimensions
00308         : mpl::transform<D1,D2,mpl::plus<_1,_2> >
00309         {};
00310 
00311         template <class D1, class D2>
00312         struct divide_dimensions
00313         : mpl::transform<D1,D2,mpl::minus<_1,_2> >
00314         {};
00316     } // end of Internal namespace
00317 
00326     template <class D1, class D2, class T>
00327     Quantity<typename Internal::multiply_dimensions<D1,D2>::type, T>
00328     operator*(Quantity<D1, T> l, Quantity<D2, T> r) {
00329         return Quantity<typename Internal::multiply_dimensions<D1,D2>::type, T>(
00330             l.value() * r.value());
00331     }
00332 
00333 
00337     template <class D1, class D2, class T>
00338     Quantity<typename Internal::divide_dimensions<D1,D2>::type, T>
00339     operator/(Quantity<D1, T> l, Quantity<D2, T> r) {
00340         return Quantity<typename Internal::divide_dimensions<D1,D2>::type, T>(
00341             l.value() / r.value());
00342     }

00350     namespace SI {
00351         typedef Quantity<dims::mass> Kilograms;
00352         typedef Quantity<dims::length> Meters;
00353         typedef Quantity<dims::force> Newtons;
00354         typedef Quantity<dims::speed> MetersPerSecond;
00355         typedef Quantity<dims::accel> MetersPerSecondSquared;
00356         typedef Quantity<dims::torque> NewtonMeters;
00357         typedef Quantity<dims::stiffness> NewtonsPerMeter;
00358     } // end of SI namespace
